QuestData.Title: Volcanoth!
QuestData.Description: It took a lot of blood, sweat, and tears, but the Bootzooka, patent-pending, is ready for use!$B$BThese no-good pygmies have been feeding our people to their "god", Volcanoth, and they're about to unleash it on our town!$B$BYou have to get into the cave and kill that thing before it's too late!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Use the Bootzooka to bring down this monstrosity!!!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Bootzooka to slay Volcanoth.
QuestData.RewardText: I managed to get everyone else safely back to town.$B$BJump in, we gotta get out of here before the volcano blows for good!!!
